summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Emergent Nexus workspace application. Backend APIs are fully functional, but frontend has critical routing issues preventing Kanban Board and Evidence Board from loading properly.

ui_bugs.issue: Component not rendering when navigating to /kanban route
Component not rendering when navigating to /evidence route
ReactMarkdown component has className prop error causing console warnings

integration_issues.issue: Only Markdown Editor loads properly, Kanban and Evidence tools fail to render despite URL changes
Toggle edit button becomes unresponsive after switching to preview mode

passed_tests: All CRUD operations for nodes (markdown, kanban-card, evidence-item)
Markdown Editor - create, edit, save notes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical routing issues: 1) KanbanBoard component not rendering on /kanban route, 2) EvidenceBoard component not rendering on /evidence route, 3) ReactMarkdown className prop error, 4) Preview mode toggle button responsiveness in Markdown Editor. The routing logic in ToolWorkspace.js may need debugging as URL changes but components don't load.
